mapper.select: SELECT DAILY_ID, PLAN_ID, WORK_DATE AS actualDate, DAILY_QTY AS actualQty, DEFECT_QTY, REMARK, CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM PRODUCTION_DAILY WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId} ORDER BY WORK_DATE DESC, CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTION_DAILY ( PLAN_ID, WORK_DATE, DAILY_QTY, DEFECT_QTY, REMARK ) VALUES ( #{planId}, #{actualDate}, #{actualQty}, #{defectQty}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCTION_PLAN SET STATUS = '진행중', ACTUAL_START_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId} AND STATUS = '작업지시'
UPDATE PRODUCTION_PLAN SET STATUS = '완료', COMPLETION_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId} AND STATUS = '진행중'
mapper.select: SELECT PP.PLAN_ID, PP.ITEM_CODE, I.ITEM_ID, I.ITEM_NAME, PP.ACTUAL_QTY, I.PRICE FROM PRODUCTION_PLAN PP JOIN ITEM I ON PP.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE WHERE PP.PLAN_ID = #{planId} AND PP.STATUS = '완료' AND PP.ACTUAL_QTY > 0
